value.name: Pistons’ Langston Galloway talks favorite players, favorite kicks in Twitter Q+A
value.description: On Sunday afternoon, Detroit Pistons Langston Galloway answered some questions from fans and other members of the NBA on Twitter. It’s been just over a week since “NBA Together” was launched by the league. As many around the world continue to stay home to help limit the spread of the coronavirus, the NBA has turned to its athletes ...

value.name: Carmelo Anthony says he would have won 'two or three rings' if Pistons picked him in 2003 NBA Draft
value.description: Instead of getting selected by Detroit with the No. 2 pick, Anthony got drafted third overall by the Denver Nuggets

value.name: Carmelo Anthony to Dwayne Wade if he were drafted by Detroit Pistons: 'I know I would have had two, maybe two or three rings'
value.description: Carmelo Anthony firmly believes he would have won multiple rings if he were drafted by the Detroit Pistons back in 2003.

value.name: Detroit Pistons are desperate for talent. These 2020 NBA draft top prospects might help
value.description: Detroit Pistons are finally in position to grab a high draft pick after the season. A look at 2020 NBA draft top prospects.

value.name: Latest sports news: Could Carmelo Anthony have been the Pistons’ missing piece? Khabib-Ferguson (surprise!) canceled again
value.description: After James went first, one pick was sprinkled in between the rest of the group. The Pistons selected Serbian 7-footer Darko Milicic second overall over Anthony. Milicic made minimal impact in Detroit. It’s a difficult question to answer. The Pistons won the 2004 NBA Championship, lost to the Spurs in 2005, and failed in the Eastern ...

value.name: Despite pandemic, Pistons move forward with draft preparations
value.description: Despite pandemic, Pistons move forward with draft preparations With the NCAAs canceled and player combine in limbo, the Pistons like other NBA teams are evaluating prospects on video. Check out this story on detroitnews.com: https://www.detroitnews.com/story/sports/nba/pistons/2020/03/28/pandemic-throws-wrench-into-pistons-draft-preparations ...

value.name: Dwane Casey describes how the Pistons confronted the coronavirus
value.description: From playing one of the last games before the NBA suspension to the challenge of a player diagnosed with the coronavirus, the Detroit Pistons have had a strenuous experience dealing with a global pandemic.

video.name: Dwane Casey describes how the Pistons confronted the coronavirus

value.name: Kelvin Calhoun in coma weeks after working Pistons-Jazz game on March 7
value.description: Kelvin Calhoun worked the Detroit Pistons-Utah Jazz game as a camera operator. Within a week, he and 3 players tested positive for the coronavirus.

video.name: Kelvin Calhoun worked the Pistons-Jazz game on March 7. Now he's in a coma

value.name: Are The Detroit Pistons At A Disadvantage With No Pre-Draft Process?
value.description: In a crisis, the best tend to rise to the occasion. We don't yet know where the Detroit Pistons front office stands among the best organizations, but we'll find out a great deal based on how they fare in a draft with no pre-draft process.

value.name: Pistons' Dwane Casey Was 'Very Unhappy' Christian Wood's Coronavirus Test Leaked
value.description: Detroit Pistons head coach Dwane Casey said he was "very unhappy" news of forward Christian Wood testing positive for the coronavirus became public. Casey told ESPN's Jackie MacMullan the information was leaked to the media before Wood even had a chance to inform his family. "Christian was upset his name got out there. He didn't release it.

video.name: Pistons' Dwane Casey Was 'Very Unhappy' Christian Wood's Coronavirus Test Leaked
